name: vite-plugin-cwd
description: Get your cwd as a vite env variable
author: David HÃ©rault <dherault@gmail.com> (https://github.com/dherault)

scripts.patch: npm version patch && git add . -A && git commit -m "[vite-plugin-cwd] Publish patch" && npm publish
scripts.minor: npm version minor && git add . -A && git commit -m "[vite-plugin-cwd] Publish minor" && npm publish
